channel.title: CVE Feed for Silicon Labs -- Z-Wave
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Silicon Labs -- Z-Wave

item.title: CVE-2018-25029|2024-08-05T12:26:39.603Z -- silicon%20labs -- z-wave
item.description: The Z-Wave specification requires that S2 security can be downgraded to S0 or other less secure protocols, allowing an attacker within radio range during pairing to downgrade and then exploit a different vulnerability (CVE-2013-20003) to intercept and spoof traffic.
